about_the_game:
● Join forces with House Davion's Kestrel Lancers to experience the 4th Succession War
● Progress through a new Linear Campaign to achieve key strategic outcomes
● Fight alongside large combined forces in all out war
● Experience intense urban combat in large all city settings with massive destruction

Experience the 4th Succession War
Fight in battles set during the famous Inner Sphere conflict and experience first-hand the frontlines of the 4th Succession War with 14 new campaign missions

New Linear Campaign
Features a new linear campaign with unique mechanics, authored missions, and custom dialogue and cinematics

All Out War
Experience All-Out-War scenarios with large-scale expansive combat in 7 new questlines that include 10 new "battle" scenarios

Large City Urban Combat
Fight in new cities that are massively larger than any previously experienced, never knowing what's around the next corner

New 'Mech Variants
Over 20 new variants of existing 'Mechs, New Kestrel Lancers 'Mech skin, and 5 new 'Mech-specific skins

New Garrisons
Discover new Garrisons including Orbital Guns firing on invasion forces, and a new 'Mech Factory Garrison featuring MW5's first indoor play space

New Biomes
Battle in new Mega-city, Jungle, and Tourmaline Desert biomes

New Procedural Content
New Procedural Content including new random rewards from Assassination Missions, and surprise Artillery on Raid Missions

FREE Update content
● New ability to switch player control to any AI Lance 'Mechs
● New melee combat with the ability to damage enemy 'Mechs with your 'Mechs' fists
● Other new quality of life updates including an updated HUD, and more!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-7100/AMD Ryzen 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 770/AMD Radeon R9 280X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: Broadband internet connection is needed to play and host Co-op games. Internet Connection is NOT Required for Single player once the game is downloaded.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit version)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K/AMD Ryzen 7 1700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070/AMD RX Vega 56
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: Broadband internet connection is needed to play and host Co-op games. Internet Connection is NOT Required for Single player once the game is downloaded.
